item.title: Import Existing Resources into Terrafrorm
item.description: There could be scenarios where you want to import the already existing resources into terraform Google cloud https://gist.github.com/kiranchavala/54a930c8da148cc2b637c053dc1ba8ba AWS https://gist.github.com/kiranchavala/c2a01a7a43ea15cb8921a710d6cf22ea Azure https://gist.github.com/kiranchavala/18a1c555c198eb0944cbad3791602dc7 Openstack https://gist.github.com/kiranchavala/c63243b0b76adcdafc7d06d87a304370 Cloudstack https://gist.github.com/kiranchavala/c1b81f1d629b0567e08e219891d4ed48
